workflowInfo.workflowDescription: This workflow is used to configure the Cross Memory Server

variable.name: zowe_install_path
variable.label: Install Path
variable.abstract: Path for the Zowe runtime installation
variable.description: Specify the path that was used for the ZOWE runtime installation

string.errorMessage: Specify proper full USS path ending without a trailing slash.

variable.name: zowe_dsn_prefix
variable.label: Zowe Data Set Prefix
variable.abstract: Data Set HLQ for the Zowe runtime installation
variable.description: Specify the data set high level qualifier that was used for the Zowe runtime installation

variable.name: xmem_dasd
variable.label: Cross Memory Server DASD
variable.abstract: Specify the DASD that will be used for the Cross Memory Server data sets.
variable.description: Specify the DASD that will be used for the Cross Memory Server data sets. Specify the DASD in either of the following formats: VOL=SER=volume for non-SMS managed data sets STORCLAS=storage_class for SMS managed data sets

variable.name: proclib
variable.label: Procedure Library
variable.abstract: Specify the procedure library for the started task
variable.description: Specify the PROCLIB data set name that will be used to store the customized Cross Memory Server STC JCL

step.name: define_variables
step.title: Define Variables
step.description: Define the variable values for the execution
step.instructions: Run this step to define the variables for the workflow execution.

step.name: allocate_xmem
step.title: Allocate Cross Memory Server Data Sets
step.description: Allocates the data sets for the Cross Memory Server.
step.instructions: Use this step to allocate the data sets required for Cross Memory Server

step.name: copy_artifacts
step.title: Copy artifacts
step.description: Copies the necessary artifacts (load modules, parmlib members, etc). Also copies the STC to the proclib.
step.instructions: Run this step to populate the previously allocated data sets and copy the STC procedures.

step.name: apf_auth
step.title: APF Authorize Load Library
step.description: This step will dynamically APF authorize the Cross Memory Server LOADLIB
step.instructions: Run this step to dynamically APF authorize the load library. If you want the APF, to be permanent, add following library to your system authorization: ${instance-zowe_dsn_prefix}.LOADLIB

step.name: start_xmem
step.title: Start the Cross Memory Server server
step.description: This step starts the Cross Memory Server
step.instructions:
Run this step to start the Cross Memory Server.
You can also do it manually with the following command: /S ZWESISTC,REUSASID=YES
To stop the Cross Memory Server use: /P ZWESISTC
